snippet: Prosecutors have asked a coroner to establish whether Cardinal Anthony J. Bevilacqua died of natural causes following sexual abuse scandal in the Archdiocese of Philadelphia.
abstract: Pennsylvania prosecutors ask a coroner to establish whether Cardinal Anthony J Bevilacqua died of natural causes, given that he died a day after a judge ruled him competent to testify at the trial of his longtime aide Monsignor William Lynn on child endangerment charges.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors have asked a coroner to establish whether Cardinal Anthony J. Bevilacqua died of natural causes following sexual abuse scandal in the Archdiocese of Philadelphia.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Answers Sought in Cardinal’s Death
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Answers Sought In Cardinal’s Death
